resources.string: HELP : LBF, Library Book Finder helps to find the needed book from your library. Just put the right input up there to search book by name, author’s name or by book’s ISBN (International Standard Book Number ) and press the search button. You will be entertained with book’s info like if available then where it placed in the library. Just go over there and get the book.
NOTE : Please check your last date of returning book and return it within given limits. OtherWise you will be fined Rs.100 per day.
